com.hazelcast.map.impl.nearcache

Class NonStopInvalidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.map.impl.nearcache.AbstractNearCacheInvalidator
      • com.hazelcast.map.impl.nearcache.NonStopInvalidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NearCacheInvalidator

    public class NonStopInvalidator
extends AbstractNearCacheInvalidator
    Sends invalidations to near-caches immediately.

    • Method Detail

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate(String mapName,
                       Data key,
                       String sourceUuid)
        Description copied from interface: NearCacheInvalidator
        Invalidates local and remote near-caches. Local near-caches are node local, remote near-caches can be exist on remote members or clients.
        Parameters:
        mapName - name of the map.
        key - key of the entry to be removed from near-cache.
        sourceUuid - caller uuid

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate(String mapName,
                       List<Data> keys,
                       String sourceUuid)
        Description copied from interface: NearCacheInvalidator
        Invalidates local and remote near-caches. Local near-caches are node local, remote near-caches can be exist on remote members or clients.
        Parameters:
        mapName - name of the map.
        keys - keys of the entries to be removed from near-cache.
        sourceUuid - caller uuid

      • sendClientNearCacheClearEvent

        public void sendClientNearCacheClearEvent(String mapName,
                                          String sourceUuid)
        Description copied from interface: NearCacheInvalidator
        Send clear event to client-side near-cache invalidation listeners.
        Parameters:
        mapName - name of the map.
        sourceUuid - caller uuid

      • destroy

        public void destroy(String mapName)
        Description copied from interface: NearCacheInvalidator
        Removes supplied maps invalidation queue and flushes its content. This method is called when removing a near-cache with MapRemoteService.destroyDistributedObject(String)
        Parameters:
        mapName - name of the map.
        See Also:
        MapRemoteService.destroyDistributedObject(String)

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from interface: NearCacheInvalidator
        Resets this invalidator back to its initial state. Aimed to call with ManagedService.reset()
        See Also:
        ManagedService#reset()}

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Description copied from interface: NearCacheInvalidator
        Shuts down this invalidator and releases used resources. Aimed to call with ManagedService.shutdown(boolean)
        See Also:
        com.hazelcast.spi.ManagedService#shutdown(boolean)}
